data.text: @PTU958 @RIDeptEd @pvdschools So they can fail our students for 2 more years?

@Island417 @PTU958 @RIDeptEd @pvdschools There were many of us who taught in person the entire time. The district set up DL policy which left 40 some students to one teacher online, so no it wasnâ€™t a vacation for those who were distant learning or in person.
@PTU958 @RIDeptEd @pvdschools "Distance learning"...aka vacation days - something kids would still be doing if you had your way.
@PTU958 @RIDeptEd @pvdschools What? They are asking for a two year extension on the takeover????
